reviewText: This is an inaccurate, untruthful version of U.S. History that is not to be believed. It is presented with a conservative, "religious" bias that distorts the facts. Your children will be disappointed, confused, and distrustful when they learn what they thought was true never happened this way. Children can handle the truth, warts and all, and learn from mistakes. Very poor animation.
I wanted it for my grandkids.  It lost their interest right away.  Poor graphics and presentation.
